Course Description:

One-on-one (1:1) meetings are a critical tool for managers, HR professionals, and business leaders to drive employee engagement, performance management, coaching, and continuous feedback. This course provides a structured approach to implementing effective 1:1 meetings, covering their purpose, formats, and impact on business efficiency. • The strategic importance of 1:1 meetings in improving employee engagement and business performance.

• Different types of 1:1 meetings and when to use them, from coaching and feedback to burnout prevention and conflict resolution.

• How to build rapport and foster strong manager-employee relationships through structured conversations.

• The GROW coaching model and Google’s coaching techniques for effective leadership.

• Best practices for giving constructive feedback without demotivating employees.

• How to integrate 1:1 meetings into company culture, track ROI, and automate the process for efficiency.

• Performance management 1:1s: setting goals, tracking progress, and improving accountability.

• Relationship-building 1:1s: fostering trust and improving team dynamics.

• Coaching-focused 1:1s: guiding employees through career development.

• Feedback-driven 1:1s: encouraging continuous learning and performance enhancement.

• Diagnosing burnout and preventing disengagement through structured 1:1s.

• Conflict resolution meetings: addressing workplace issues effectively.

• HR-led 1:1s for better employee experience and retention.

• 1:1 meetings for career development and professional growth.


Class 3: Building Strong Employee Relationships Through 1:1s

• How 1:1 meetings strengthen manager-employee interactions.

• Techniques for building rapport and fostering trust.

• Boosting employee engagement and morale through meaningful conversations.

• Making 1:1 meetings an employee’s most valued 30 minutes.


Class 4: Coaching in 1:1 Meetings

• What coaching is and how it works in leadership.

• Google’s coaching techniques for managers.

• The GROW coaching model: how to use it in 1:1 meetings.

• When coaching is appropriate and when alternative approaches are needed.


Class 5: Giving Effective Feedback in 1:1s

• How to give constructive feedback that improves performance.

• The formula for delivering effective feedback in a 1:1 setting.

• How to criticize without demotivating employees.

• Best practices for providing positive feedback that reinforces strengths.


Class 6: Implementing 1:1 Meetings Across the Organization

• Creating a business case for 1:1 meetings to gain executive buy-in.

• Presenting the 1:1 strategy to top management for company-wide adoption.

Who Should Take This Course?

• Managers and team leaders looking to improve communication and employee performance.

• HR professionals responsible for implementing structured 1:1 meeting programs.

• Business executives aiming to optimize employee engagement and company culture.

Why Take This Course?


Learn from HR expert Mike Pritula, an industry leader in employee engagement and leadership development.

Start Leading High-Impact 1:1 Meetings Today!


Unlock the power of 1:1 meetings to improve employee relationships, drive engagement, and build a high-performance culture. Enroll now and transform the way you lead!

courseDetails.title: Chatbot for Beginner: Create an AI Chatbot without Coding

courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you still creating a chatbot with tiresome coding? Doesn’t that take up all of your time and leave you exhausted?

Are you ready to supercharge your customer service experience with an AI chatbot?


Instead, why don’t you try the easy way to help your business save so much time, effort and money? We have created a step-by-step guide to build the perfect no-code chatbot in less than 10 minutes. Creating a chatbot has never been easier.


You don’t need a Ph.D. in computer science or coding experience to get started. With advances in natural language processing, you can create your own AI Chatbot right now.

Creating a GPT chatbot makes customer service easier and more efficient, allowing customers to get the answers they need quickly and conveniently. Plus, it’s fun to watch your chatbot come alive!

I’ll walk you through the steps of creating your own AI chatbot without any coding experience. We’ll discuss what AI Chatbot is and why it’s so useful, plus how to set up your own AI chatbot from scratch with no coding skills required.

By the end of this Video, you’ll be ready to start creating powerful AI-driven customer service experiences for your business


Whether you’re a small business, freelancer, e-commerce store owner, a startup, or a large corporation — you don’t need coding experience to create your own AI Chatbot! In fact, all you really need is access to the right tools and technology.


Benefits of Using an AI Chatbot

AI Chatbots are all the rage these days and having one of your own can be a major advantage for your business. Whether you’re looking to automate customer service or create an interactive database for internal use, AI Chatbot can help you achieve that with ease.

First off, leveraging an AI Chatbot allows you to save time and money, as they don’t require any coding experience or knowledge to get up and running.

All you need to do is provide basic information such as the language the bot should understand, the type of questions it should answer, and any other commands you want it to carry out. This makes AI Chatbots incredibly efficient and easy to use.

Not only that, but AI Chatbots are also incredibly adaptable; they can quickly learn from customer conversations, identify patterns in customer queries, and suggest actions accordingly.

That means customers will receive a more tailored experience every time they engage with your bot — something that just isn’t possible with manual human labour.

So if you’re looking for an efficient way to streamline customer service without having to hire coders or take on massive amounts of development projects, then creating your own AI Chatbot might be the perfect solution!


Why do you need to create a chatbot for your business?

Creating and deploying an AI-powered chatbot for your business brings a lot of benefits to the table. Here are a few of them:

24/7 support availability

A chatbot prevents losing a customer by providing instant support outside business hours. Without it, customers would have to wait for fixed-schedule agents, leading to potential abandonment.

‍Lower costs

Using chatbots can significantly reduce your customer support costs and overheads by automating tasks and screening calls, potentially decreasing call duration. Studies reveal that AI-powered chatbots can decrease customer support costs by 30%.

‍No language barrier

Chatbots break down language barriers and enable global outreach by supporting 50+ languages. With a multilingual chatbot, you can scale localization without increasing the agent count.

Improved lead generation

Lead-generation chatbots are more effective than big, clunky forms that can be intimidating and time-consuming. Chatbots present questions one at a time, reducing the effort required to fill them out.

‍Increased conversion rate

An intelligent chatbot can boost conversion rates by providing instant answers to customers' product queries. Shopify stores can use conversion triggers like discounts and offers to engage customers and reduce cart abandonment.


You don’t need coding experience to build your own AI chatbot! With the right AI tools, you can create an expert-level AI Chatbot that can understand natural language and seamlessly converse with humans.



Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your career prospects, expand your skill set, or simply satisfy your curiosity.

ENROLL NOW & Embark on a journey towards AI Mastery. Remember, excellence is a journey, not a destination.

Welcome to The Complete Flutter 2.0 Development Course. The most up-to-date Flutter course available online. Covering all the fundamental concepts for Flutter development, using the latest Flutter 2.0 version.

I’ve built this course over months, perfecting the curriculum to ensure that you come out of this course as a fully-fledged Flutter developer. I’ll take you from scratch and make you into a skilled Flutter developer with a strong portfolio of beautiful Flutter apps.

This course will teach Flutter & Dart from scratch, NO prior knowledge of either of the two is required! And you certainly don't need any Android or iOS development experience since the whole idea behind Flutter is to only learn one language.

You'll learn Flutter not only in theory but we'll build a series of complete and realistic apps throughout this course. These apps will feature both all the core basics as well as more advanced features like using Firebase, Device Storage, Animations, State Management, Data Persistence and much more!

WHAT DOES THIS COURSE FEATURE?

I'll take you step-by-step through engaging and fun video tutorials and teach you everything you need to know to succeed as a Flutter developer.

The course includes 20+ hours of HD video tutorials and builds your programming knowledge while making real world apps. e.g. Instagram, Quizlet and CoinMarketCap.

By the end of this course, you will be fluent in Dart programming and be ready to build your own Flutter apps and become a fully fledged Flutter developer.

You'll also have a portfolio of over 7 apps that you can show off to any potential employer.

By the end of this course, you’ll have mastered the skills of developing cross-platform native apps using Flutter.

WHAT TOPICS WILL BE COVERED?

I know that you're here because you value your time. If you wanted to watch someone program for hours and hours without explaining what they're doing, you'd be on YouTube.

By getting this course, you can be rest assured that the course is carefully thought out and edited. There are beautiful animations that explain all the difficult concepts and I’m always on hand to answer student questions.


  • Fundamental Flutter Concepts: e.g. Stateful vs. Stateless Widgets, Widget Trees, State Management, Animations, Themes and much more.

  • Fundamental Dart Concepts: e.g. Lists, Maps, Enums, loops, Futures, Streams, Classes, If/Else, Switch Statements, Control Flow, much more.

  • Detailed Setup Instructions: For both MacOS and Windows

  • Concepts Regarding Null-Safety: Late, Assertion Operator, Optional Variables, and much more.

  • Object Oriented Programming (OOP): The Type System Variables, Functions and Methods, Inheritance, Classes and Protocols.

  • Software Design: How to organize and format code for readability and how to implement the Model ­View­ Controller (MVC) design pattern.

  • Networking: How to make asynchronous API calls, store and retrieve data from the cloud, and use the JSON format for server communication.

  • Data Storage: How to use Firebase Cloud Firestore to act as a backend for your Flutter apps.

  • Authentication: How to use log in and register users for your Flutter apps.

  • Animations: How to implement animations in Flutter apps using a variety of ways.

  • State Management: How to use setState, prop drilling, lifting state up, callbacks and the Provider package to manage app state.

  • Debugging & Testing: Implement Unit, Widget and Integration Testing In Flutter Apps.


WHAT ELSE DOES THIS COURSE OFFER?

– Deep, Fine-Grained Learning – This course is jam-packed with information. I made the course that I most wanted to take and as a result, I didn't skimp on the details. You're going to cover more topics and material in greater depth than ever before.

– 100% Real-World Practice – My goal is to get you writing code as much as possible. And not just any code–we'll be working exclusively on practical tasks that are instrumental in building your own amazing real-world apps.

– No-Nonsense, Spot-On Explanations - Every lesson is to the point. I break down what we're making, how we'll be doing it, and what the final product will look like, all on top of helpful and illustrative descriptions to aid your understanding along the way.

– 30-Day Money Back Guarantee - I'm so confident that you'll love this course that we're offering a FULL money back guarantee for 30 days! So it's a complete no-brainer, sign up today with ZERO risk and EVERYTHING to gain.

I really enjoyed making this course and I think you’ll enjoy taking it just as much.

Looking forward to seeing you taking this course!

• Talent Acquisition and Onboarding: Gain expertise in candidate sourcing, competency-based interviewing, and developing comprehensive onboarding programs to integrate new hires seamlessly.

Generalista de RH: Domine o Essencial da Gestão de Recursos Humanos


O Generalista de RH desempenha um papel fundamental na gestão e execução das principais funções de RH que apoiam o sucesso de uma organização. Este curso online abrangente, liderado pelo especialista da área Mike Pritula, foi projetado para capacitar profissionais de RH, aspirantes e atuantes, com ferramentas e conhecimentos essenciais para se destacarem em recrutamento, engajamento de colaboradores, cultura corporativa e muito mais.


O que você aprenderá:


• Funções principais de RH: Compreenda as diversas responsabilidades de um Generalista de RH, incluindo recrutamento, integração, relações com funcionários e administração.


• Desenvolvimento de estratégia de RH: Aprenda a alinhar práticas de RH com os objetivos de negócios e a justificar decisões estratégicas.


• Motivação e engajamento de funcionários: Desenvolva e implemente estratégias para fidelizar, aumentar a moral e melhorar a produtividade.


• Ferramentas e análises de RH: Domine ferramentas de automação de RH, conduza auditorias e aplique análises para tomar decisões baseadas em dados.


Programa do curso:

1. Quem é um Generalista de RH e seu papel na empresa: Explore a importância e as competências necessárias para o sucesso nessa função.

2. Entendendo os negócios da empresa e justificando decisões: Alinhe iniciativas de RH com objetivos organizacionais.

3. Conduzindo auditorias de RH: Avalie funções de RH, identifique lacunas e proponha melhorias.

4. Pesquisas de opinião dos colaboradores: Aprenda a criar e implementar pesquisas de engajamento e satisfação.

5. Desenvolvimento de estratégias de RH: Crie estratégias abrangentes alinhadas aos objetivos organizacionais.

6. Seleção, recrutamento e avaliação de candidatos: Domine processos de recrutamento, desde a busca até a avaliação de talentos.

7. Adaptação de funcionários: Implemente programas eficazes de integração e adaptação para novos colaboradores.

8. Treinamento e desenvolvimento de colaboradores: Planeje e execute programas de treinamento impactantes.

9. Motivação de colaboradores: Crie programas para aumentar a moral, engajamento e lealdade dos funcionários.

10. Gestão de folha de pagamento: Entenda os fundamentos da gestão de folha de pagamento e seu papel no RH.

11. Pacotes de benefícios: Desenvolva e gerencie pacotes de benefícios abrangentes.

12. Gestão de desempenho e OKRs: Utilize ferramentas como OKRs para alinhar desempenho individual com objetivos organizacionais.

13. Engajamento e fidelização de colaboradores: Desenvolva estratégias para medir e aprimorar o engajamento.

14. Lidando com o burnout: Mitigue o burnout dos colaboradores para manter uma equipe produtiva.

15. Comunicação interna na empresa: Desenvolva estratégias de comunicação interna eficazes.

16. Gestão da cultura corporativa: Cultive e mantenha uma cultura corporativa positiva alinhada aos valores da organização.

17. Fundamentos de gestão de pessoas: Aprenda habilidades essenciais para gerenciar e liderar equipes.

18. Automação de RH: Explore as melhores ferramentas para otimizar processos de RH.

19. Conduzindo reuniões individuais: Estruture reuniões eficazes com colaboradores.

20. Retenção de talentos: Desenvolva estratégias para reduzir a rotatividade e reter os melhores talentos.

21. Análises de RH: Use dados para tomar decisões informadas e melhorar o desempenho de RH.

22. Orçamento de RH: Crie e gerencie orçamentos para iniciativas de RH.

courseDetails.title: Competency Based Interview: Master Modern Hiring Techniques
courseDetails.shortDescription: Competency-Based Interview | Behavioral Interview | Hiring Techniques | Recruitment | STAR Method | Talent Assessment
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mastering Competency-Based Behavioral Interviews


Course Description:


Hiring the right talent is one of the most critical aspects of building a high-performing organization. Competency-based behavioral interviews help hiring managers, recruiters, and HR professionals assess candidates effectively by focusing on past experiences and demonstrated skills. This course is designed to equip you with the knowledge, techniques, and tools needed to conduct structured, competency-based interviews that lead to better hiring decisions.


Through practical case studies, real-world examples, and interview simulations, you’ll learn how to identify key competencies, structure behavioral interview questions, and evaluate candidate responses using a scoring system. Whether you are an HR professional, hiring manager, or recruiter, this course will enhance your interviewing skills and ensure you select the best-fit candidates for your organization.

What You’ll Learn:


The Fundamentals of Competency-Based Interviews – Understand the principles behind behavioral interviewing and how it improves hiring accuracy.


Developing a Competency Model – Learn how to define core competencies for different job roles and integrate them into the hiring process.


Crafting Effective Behavioral Interview Questions – Master the STAR (Situation, Task, Action, Result) method and other structured interview techniques.


Evaluating Candidates Objectively – Implement competency-based scoring rubrics and minimize bias in the selection process.


Avoiding Common Interviewing Mistakes – Identify biases, pitfalls, and ineffective questioning methods that can lead to poor hiring decisions.


Improving Hiring Decisions with Data – Leverage competency frameworks, assessment grids, and interview scorecards for better decision-making.

Course Program:


1. Introduction to Competency-Based Interviews


• The role of behavioral and competency-based interviews in modern recruitment

• Why past behavior predicts future performance

• Difference between structured and unstructured interviews


2. Developing a Competency Model for Hiring


• Understanding competency frameworks

• Identifying technical vs. soft skills competencies

• Customizing competency models for different roles


3. Crafting Effective Behavioral Interview Questions


• Writing open-ended, behavioral interview questions

• Using the STAR method to structure candidate responses

• Common mistakes in formulating competency-based questions


4. The Interview Process: Structuring & Conducting Effective Interviews


• Best practices for planning and structuring interviews

• Conducting panel interviews using a competency-based approach

• Ensuring fairness and consistency in the hiring process


5. Competency-Based Candidate Evaluation & Decision-Making


• Designing scoring matrices for competency assessments

• Using interview scorecards for structured decision-making

• Avoiding unconscious bias in candidate evaluations


6. Improving Hiring Success with Competency-Based Interviewing


• Case studies of companies using competency-based selection

• Implementing behavioral interview training in your company

• Measuring the impact of structured hiring on talent acquisition

Who Should Take This Course?


HR professionals & recruiters looking to refine their interview process and hire high-quality candidates.


Hiring managers seeking structured, data-driven methods to evaluate candidates more effectively.


Talent acquisition specialists aiming to implement competency-based hiring frameworks.


Business leaders & team leads involved in the selection of key employees.

Why Enroll in This Course?


Learn from Industry Experts – Gain insights from experienced HR leaders and recruiters.


Practical & Actionable Knowledge – Real-life examples, downloadable templates, and interview scripts.


Step-by-Step Training – From question design to evaluation scoring, master every aspect of behavioral interviews.


Certificate of Completion – Validate your expertise in competency-based hiring.

Improve your hiring accuracy and reduce turnover by mastering behavioral, competency-based interviewing!


Enroll now and start conducting structured, effective interviews today!
targetAudiences: This course is ideal for recruiters, hiring managers, and HR professionals looking to enhance their interviewing and candidate assessment skills, as well as those new to competency-based recruitment practices.

By mastering knowledge management (KM) practices, participants can enhance information accessibility, foster a culture of knowledge sharing, and improve overall organizational efficiency.


Course Highlights:

• Comprehensive Curriculum: The course comprises six recorded lessons, each accompanied by practical homework assignments reviewed by Mike Pritula. Topics include the fundamentals of KM, methods for creating and storing knowledge, strategies for sharing and disseminating information, integration of knowledge into business processes, evaluation and improvement of KM systems, and the development of a KM strategy.

Course Program:

1. Introduction to Knowledge Management:

Understand the importance of KM, differentiate between explicit and tacit knowledge, identify common challenges in KM, and explore successful business cases of KM implementation.

2. Creating and Storing Knowledge:

Learn methods for knowledge gathering such as interviews and surveys, structuring knowledge through bases and wikis, utilizing storage tools like MS Loop, Notion, and Confluence, and ensuring the protection of intellectual property and confidential data.

3. Sharing and Disseminating Knowledge:

Explore ways to overcome barriers to knowledge sharing, foster a culture of collaboration through mentoring and learning communities, leverage technologies like Slack and Teams, and understand the roles of knowledge leaders.

4. Using Knowledge and Integrating it into Processes:

Apply principles of knowledge utilization in workflows, integrate KM systems with other business processes, employ methods like case studies for knowledge extraction, and conduct retrospectives for continuous improvement.

5. Evaluating and Improving Knowledge Management Systems:

Establish KPIs and performance metrics for KM, utilize assessment methods such as employee surveys, implement feedback systems for continuous improvement, and monitor KM effectiveness.

6. Knowledge Management Strategy:

Develop and implement a KM strategy, engage knowledge leaders and employees, cultivate a culture of continuous learning, and make strategic decisions based on data-driven planning.

This course is ideal for HR professionals and managers responsible for organizing and managing knowledge and information within their companies. courseDetails.title: Brainteasers pour les entretiens en Conseil & Finance
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cours Rapide sur les brainteasers, tests de logique, estimations, market sizing… révision rapide pour bien s’y préparer
courseDetails.longDescription:
Certains des aspects les plus angoissants des entretiens d'embauche sont la folie impromptue des questions posées, qui peuvent être encore plus bizarres que les questions d'analyse financière les plus complexes. Ne paniquez pas; au lieu de cela, prenez des précautions.

L'inflation, les prix des obligations et les taux d'intérêt peuvent être théoriquement expliqués, mais cela ne vous aidera pas si un employeur potentiel vous demande combien de ballons à l'hélium vous pouvez mettre dans un avion A380. Malgré le fait que cela n'a aucune incidence sur le rôle que vous recherchez, ce type de question est populaire dans des secteurs comme le conseil en stratégie et la banque d'investissement. Pourquoi ces questions ? Pour s'assurer que les recrues potentielles peuvent penser de manière critique dans des contraintes de temps et avec des informations limitées.

Vous n'avez pas besoin de tout savoir sur Wikipédia par cœur pour avoir une chance de répondre à ces questions. Tout comme un bon problème de mathématiques, le processus est bien plus important que la réponse finale. Certains professionnels des ressources humaines sont même d'avis qu'il n'est pas nécessaire de trouver la solution exacte, pourvu que votre raisonnement soit rigoureux et précis. Par conséquent, vous devez vous concentrer sur votre capacité à évaluer un nouveau scénario et à tirer des conclusions étayées quantitativement.

À première vue, les questions peuvent sembler être d'une grande variété et d'un niveau de difficulté très élevé. Méfiez-vous cependant; l'intervieweur peut ne pas rechercher la précision. Son objectif est de jauger la capacité de logique et d'analyse du candidat. Il est donc crucial de détailler les étapes utilisées pour résoudre le problème et pourquoi elles ont été prises dans un ordre particulier. Et assurez-vous d'être très clair, précis et bref.

Malheureusement, de nombreux étudiants ne sont pas préparés lorsqu'il s'agit de résoudre un brainteaser ou faire un market sizing. Et c'est tout l'intérêt de cette formation ! De quelles vérités universelles doit-on être conscient ? Quelles échelles de grandeur devez-vous comprendre ? Comment déterminer la taille réelle d'un marché sans s'embourber dans les détails. Vous apprendrez tout ce que vous devez savoir pour réussir cette partie de l'entretien grâce à cette formation.

C'est un cours intensif qui convient aux personnes voulant faire une révision rapide de cette partie de l'entretien. Si vous êtes à la recherche d'un cours qui commence par les bases et passe aux sujets avancés rapidement, c'est le meilleur cours pour vous.
targetAudiences: Tous ceux qui veulent travailler dans le conseil en stratégie et la banque d'affaire
Les débutants qui cherchent à commencer leurs entraînements très tôt
Les personnes sous pression cherchant à réviser les brainteasers et market sizings la veille d'un entretien d'embauche

Mastering Change Management: Implementing Organizational Transformation


In today’s rapidly evolving business environment, change management is a critical skill for leaders, HR professionals, and managers. This course provides a structured, hands-on approach to organizational change, ensuring you can successfully plan, implement, and sustain business transformations.


By following Kotter’s Change Management Model and behavioral change strategies, this course equips you with practical tools to overcome resistance, engage employees, and embed change into corporate culture. Whether you are a Change Manager, HR professional, or business leader, you will develop the skills needed to lead successful transformations with confidence.


What You Will Learn:


Understand why change management is challenging and the common mistakes companies make

Implement Kotter’s 8-Step Change Model for structured transformation

Engage employees, build urgency, and create a change-ready culture

Leverage emotional intelligence to drive behavioral adaptation in change initiatives

Develop change strategies that align with business objectives

Utilize quick wins and reinforcement strategies to sustain long-term change

Implement Google’s CES Model to make change stick in corporate culture


Course Structure & Modules


Module 1: Why Change is Hard to Implement

• How employees and leaders perceive change

• Eight critical mistakes that derail change initiatives

• Impact of failed change efforts on business performance

• Key determinants of successful organizational change

• Kotter’s Change Management Model and how it drives transformation


Module 2: The 8 Steps of the Change Process

• Breaking large-scale change projects into manageable phases

• The role of managers and leaders in guiding employees through change

• Aligning organizational goals with change strategies


Module 3: Engaging Employees in Change

• Creating a sense of urgency for change within teams

• Reinforcing the need for change through communication and leadership

• The role of leadership in driving transformation

• Forming a change leadership team and defining responsibilities


Module 4: The Role of Emotions in Change

• Applying the Rider, Elephant, and Track Model to behavioral change

• Guiding rational thinking (Rider) during transformations

• Motivating employees (Elephant) to accept and support change

• Simplifying processes (Track) to remove barriers to adoption


Module 5: Developing a Change Strategy & Vision

• Crafting a compelling change vision that resonates with employees

• Promoting the vision internally to drive commitment

• Creating an environment that supports sustainable change

• Leveraging quick wins to reinforce momentum and trust in change initiatives


Module 6: Embedding Change into Company Culture

• Ensuring long-term adoption of new business processes and strategies

• Reinforcing change through company culture and leadership buy-in

• Google’s CES Model for Change Implementation and how it ensures sustainability

• Finalizing change initiatives and tracking long-term success

Why This Course Stands Out:


Practical Change Management Training – Focuses on real-world implementation of change strategies

Step-by-Step Change Frameworks – Covers Kotter’s Model, behavioral change methods, and Google’s CES approach

Hands-On Exercises & Assignments – Includes templates, checklists, and case studies

Comprehensive Learning Approach – Learn how to plan, execute, and sustain organizational change


Who Should Enroll?

  • Change Managers & Organizational Development Leaders

  • HR Professionals & Business Transformation Specialists

  • Project Managers Implementing Large-Scale Changes

  • CEOs, Executives, & Senior Leaders Managing Business Strategy

  • Consultants & Change Agents Leading Digital and Cultural Transformations

  • Enroll Today & Become a Change Management Expert!


Master organizational change frameworks, employee engagement strategies, and leadership-driven transformation techniques to drive business success.


This course provides a competitive edge by focusing on real-world applications, emotional intelligence in change, and leadership engagement, ensuring your ability to lead successful organizational transformations.


About the course:

Welcome to this In-Depth and Comprehensive Change Management Course!


In today’s fast-paced and ever-changing business environment, organizations must adapt to continuous transformations to stay competitive and relevant. Effective change management has become an essential skill for leaders, managers, and professionals across all sectors. This "Organization Change Management" course is tailored to provide you with the knowledge, strategies, and tools required to understand, plan, and implement successful organizational changes.


Discover the key to successful change delivery with this Organization Change Management course, carefully designed based on years of practical experience managing projects for industry leaders such as Oracle, Magna, SAP, Gazprom, FIS, EFES, and more.


This Organization Change Management course is built on my extensive experience working with major global corporations, including Oracle, Magna, SAP, Gazprom, FIS, EFES, and many others.


This Organization Change Management course delves into two major standards and methodologies: the Association of Change Management Professionals (ACMP) and ADKAR (developed by Prosci). This combination will provide you with the tools and knowledge needed to manage highly complex and large-scale change projects or initiatives with significant change components. If you aim to pursue certification in Change Management, this course will prepare you to pass the exams for both ACMP and PROSCI, enabling you to become a certified change management professional.


This Organization Change Management course is particularly beneficial for Project Managers, especially those holding PMI PMP certification. It will deepen your understanding of Change Management and its connection to Project Management, equipping you to excel in managing projects with substantial change elements. Additionally, it offers 12 PMI PDUs to support your certification maintenance.


This Organization Change Management course balances practical application with theoretical knowledge, following a logical progression of Change Management throughout the lifecycle of change project delivery.


A significant portion of this Organization Change Management course focuses on Analysis and Strategy for delivering change. Drawing from my experience, this aspect is typically executed in large, multinational corporations for complex change initiatives such as mergers, acquisitions, cultural transformations, or major reorganizations. These organizations often have a Global OCM (Organization Change Management Office) in place, as seen in companies like Oracle, SAP, Accenture, and Magna.


You will learn how to manage changes, assess the impact of change, and evaluate organizational readiness for change. From there, you will discover how to define a change strategy, create a Change Management Plan, and execute it effectively. You will gain a thorough understanding of these concepts and their application in major global corporations. As the course progresses, you will explore resistance management, sustainability of change, and the importance of engagement levels and types to ensure lasting and successful transformations. Mastering resistance management and sustainability is a critical differentiator between average and exceptional Change Managers.


Upon completing this Organization Change Management course, your perspective on changes and projects will shift toward a more strategic and forward-thinking approach. You will be able to see the bigger picture, anticipate future risks, and prevent issues that could jeopardize the success of change initiatives. Your insights and expertise will bring immediate value to your organization.


Additionally, you will learn how to raise awareness for change, foster desire for change, and secure support and commitment. You will also gain skills to build knowledge and ability within employees, ensuring their success post-change implementation.


This Organization Change Management course will distinguish you from average Change or Project Managers. By applying the tools and techniques learned here, you will become a highly valuable asset to your organization, enhancing your career advancement opportunities.


After completing the training and applying the knowledge to deliver several projects, you will likely advance to high-value strategic change initiatives or move into higher management roles, recognized as someone who consistently delivers value.


This Organization Change Management course is ideal for anyone responsible for driving change within organizations, including Change Managers, Project Managers, HR professionals, Team Leaders, Managers, and Senior Managers.


It is also perfect for those aspiring to become certified change management professionals through Prosci (ADKAR) or ACMP.


While some experience in managing change or projects is helpful, it is not mandatory, as all concepts are explained in detail. However, a basic understanding of project management theory is recommended.

VBA (Visual Basic for Application) est un langage utilisé pour programmer des tâches et des actions dans Excel ou développer des fonctions supplémentaires dans des feuilles de calcul Excel adaptées à vos besoins de travail.

Si vous souhaitez apprendre à programmer VBA pour votre entreprise ou pour vous-même, ce cours vous est destiné. En tant que cours pour débutants, vous apprendrez les bases de la compréhension de VBA et de ce qu'il fait. Vous apprendrez comment enregistrer votre première macro, suivi d'un développement progressif dans l'apprentissage de tout le langage fondamental VBA menant à la création de votre propre module VBA.

A la fin du cours, vous aurez appris à créer vos formulaires d'utilisateur avec lesquels d'autres utilisateurs pourront interagir et saisir leurs données.

Vous pourrez ensuite dépanner et déboguer vos codes en les rendant efficaces et plus rapides tout en créant vos propres fonctions Excel personnalisées.

L'un des nombreux aspects de VBA est que lorsque vous l'apprenez, vous le savez, et il devient une partie de vous pour toujours et à long terme, vous pouvez le programmer pour faire tout votre travail.


Pourquoi suivre ce cours ?

Automatisez votre travail : vous apprenez à utiliser VBA pour automatiser les procédures, les rapports d'activités. Tout cela peut être configurés à l'aide de VBA et, d'une simple pression sur un bouton, vous pouvez générer votre rapport et vous aider à effectuer différentes actions en appuyant sur un bouton.

Accélérez votre travail : utilisez VBA pour gagner du temps en automatisant la tâche répétitive. Accélérez votre travail en utilisant la macro VBA pour automatiser les actions répétitives. VBA Excel permet de gagner du temps en terminant la même action sur plusieurs classeurs Excel, ce qui vous fait gagner beaucoup de temps grâce à une action automatisée.

Il est conçu pour les débutants : ce cours est un guide étape par étape pour une compréhension facile pour les personnes qui n'ont aucune connaissance de ce qu'est VBA mais qui ont des connaissances sur Excel.

Lors du développement de logiciels, les développeurs ont besoin d'un serveur de base de données pour stocker les informations qu'ils collectent auprès des utilisateurs potentiels, et Microsoft SQL Server est une option intéressante. Pourquoi devriez-vous vous inscrire à ce cours ?

Microsoft SQL Server est le troisième système de gestion de base de données le plus populaire, derrière Oracle SQL Developer et MySQL. À partir de ces données, il est clair qu'il existe des opportunités sur le marché pour les développeurs Microsoft SQL expérimentés.

En ce qui concerne les cours Microsoft SQL, vous ne trouverez rien de mieux que ce que ce cours a à offrir. Il explique les principes de base de Microsoft SQL Server, vous aidant à passer d'un débutant complet à un quasi-expert en technologie de base de données.

Le cours met en évidence de nombreuses fonctionnalités de Microsoft SQL, vous apprenant comment simplifier votre charge de travail en utilisant l'IA par exemple. Develop expert conflict resolution skills, strengthen emotional intelligence, and master difficult conversations for effective leadership.


Conflicts are inevitable in any organization. Whether it’s misunderstandings between team members, leadership struggles, or personal disputes, mastering conflict management is essential for maintaining a productive and positive workplace. This course provides a comprehensive framework to identify, prevent, and resolve workplace conflicts while enhancing your emotional intelligence, negotiation skills, and active listening abilities.


By learning conflict resolution techniques, mediation strategies, and communication best practices, you’ll gain the skills to de-escalate tensions, manage difficult conversations, and foster a collaborative work environment.


What You’ll Learn:

• Understanding Conflict in Teams: Explore the nature, psychology, and core elements of workplace conflicts.

• Types of Conflict: Identify the various conflict categories, their triggers, and how they escalate.

• Emotional Intelligence in Conflict Management: Develop self-awareness, self-regulation, and empathy to manage workplace disputes effectively.

• Conflict Prevention Techniques: Learn strategies for proactively assessing, mitigating, and preventing workplace conflicts.

• Negotiation & Mediation: Master negotiation tactics and conflict mediation strategies to resolve disputes amicably.

• Managing Difficult Conversations: Gain confidence in handling sensitive topics and influencing conflict outcomes.

Course Program: Comprehensive Conflict Management Training

courseDetails.longDescription:
The “Internal Communications” course at Mike Pritula Academy is designed to equip HR professionals and internal communications specialists with the tools and strategies necessary to effectively manage employee communications, implement organizational strategies, drive change, and enhance engagement.


Course Highlights:

• Comprehensive Curriculum: The course comprises six recorded lessons, each accompanied by practical homework assignments reviewed by Mike Pritula. Topics include the fundamentals of internal communication, setting strategic goals, audience analysis, message development, utilizing various communication channels, implementation techniques, and evaluation methods.

• Interactive Support: Enrollees gain access to a dedicated Q&A chat to discuss topics, share experiences, and receive support from peers and the course facilitator.

• Certification: Upon successful completion of the course and assignments, participants receive a diploma, enhancing their professional credentials.


Course Program:

1. What is Internal Communication:

Understand the importance of employee communication, how it benefits the business, and learn to conduct a communications audit and employee surveys.

2. Setting Goals for Internal Communications:

Learn to solve problems, assist management, and influence employee behavior through effective communication strategies.

3. Researching Your Target Audience and Preparing Messages:

Analyze employee demographics, segment them into groups, create employee personas, gather data, generate tailored messages, and design effective communication templates.

4. Working with Different Channels of Communication:

Choose appropriate communication channels, understand effective channel mixes, capture employee attention, collaborate with managers as communication conduits, and train managers in communication skills.

5. Implementing Internal Communications in the Company:

Establish proper communication processes, manage change through communication, alter employee behavior, convey bad news appropriately, and communicate corporate culture effectively.

6. Evaluating Internal Company Communications:

Understand the necessity of evaluation, identify key performance indicators (KPIs) for internal communication, gather relevant information, and prepare comprehensive reports for management.


Who Should Enroll:


This course is ideal for HR professionals and internal communications staff who aim to effectively implement tasks in this area. It’s particularly beneficial for those seeking practical tools and strategies to enhance their organization’s internal communication processes.


Benefits of the Course:

• Practical Tools: Gain a full range of internal communications tools, from audits and strategy development to templates, KPIs, and actionable tips.

• Career Advancement: Mastering internal communications enables HR professionals to earn the trust of staff and management more easily, facilitating active company growth and increased earning potential.

• Expert Instruction: Learn from Mike Pritula, an experienced HR leader who provides clear, practical insights applicable to real-world situations.


By enrolling in this course, participants will acquire the knowledge and skills necessary to build and manage effective internal communication systems, thereby enhancing employee engagement and supporting organizational success.
targetAudiences: This course is designed for HR professionals, internal communication specialists, managers, and business leaders who want to enhance employee engagement, improve company culture, and build effective communication strategies within their organizations. Course Description:

Product Owner Certification: Mastering the Art of Value Delivery in Scrum

Welcome to the Product Owner Certification, meticulously designed to elevate your understanding and application of the Scrum framework, specifically through the lens of a Product Owner. This assessment-driven course is tailored to affirm your expertise in Scrum practices and the nuances of the Product Owner role, as detailed in the Official Scrum Guide.




For Professionals: Enhance Your Agile Career

As a Product Owner or an individual aspiring to embrace this crucial role within Agile teams, this certification will benchmark your proficiency, enabling you to:

  • Showcase Your Expertise: Demonstrate your comprehensive grasp of the Scrum framework, making you a valuable asset in the Agile job market.

  • Guide Your Professional Journey: Identify your strengths and pinpoint areas for growth, steering your continuous learning in Agile methodologies.

  • Boost Your Career Prospects: Add a significant credential to your resume and LinkedIn profile, opening new doors to career advancement and professional recognition.

  • Establish Credibility: Earn the trust of your colleagues and employers with a certification that underscores your dedication to Agile principles and the Product Owner role.

For Organizations: Optimize Your Scrum Teams

In today's dynamic landscape of technology and product development, Agile methodologies are the bedrock of successful and timely product delivery. Adopting Scrum can fundamentally transform Agile product management, fostering enhanced collaboration and superior product outcomes. By engaging in our Product Owner Certification Assessment, your organization can reap numerous benefits:

  • Assess Team Skills: Confirm that your Product Owners and team members have a robust understanding of Scrum practices and values.

  • Boost Team Productivity: Identify Product Owners who can proficiently lead Agile teams, driving productivity and efficiency to new heights.

  • Foster a Learning Culture: Discover areas where your teams excel and where they could benefit from additional training, promoting an environment of continuous improvement.

  • Competitive Advantage: Distinguish your company in the realm of Agile product management by showcasing certified Product Owners, appealing to clients and projects that value certified expertise.


The Role of a Product Owner: Champion of Value Maximization

The Product Owner is a key player within Scrum teams, acting as the nexus between the customer, the development team, and the product itself. As a Product Owner, you are charged with:

  • Prioritizing Value Delivery Guide your team in delivering the highest value to customers by effectively managing and ordering the Product Backlog.

  • Facilitating Scrum Artifacts Collaborate with the Scrum Master and development team to ensure that Product Backlog items are well-understood, transparent, and actionable.

  • Navigating Complexity Tackle complex product challenges by fostering an environment that encourages innovation, rapid feedback, and iterative progress.

  • Mentoring and Leadership Empower your team to embrace Agile practices, promoting self-organization, and continuous growth in value delivery.


Why Choose Our Product Owner Certification Assessment?

Our assessment is thoughtfully crafted to reflect the comprehensive scope of the Scrum framework as per the Official Scrum Guide. What makes our Product Owner Certification Assessment stand out:

  • Real-World Application Our questions challenge you with scenarios that Product Owners frequently encounter, ensuring a practical understanding of the role.

  • Extensive Scope The assessment encompasses all critical aspects of the Product Owner role, from backlog management to stakeholder engagement, offering a thorough evaluation of your knowledge.

  • Immediate Insights Receive instant feedback on your performance, helping you to identify areas for further study or confirming your expertise.

  • Product Owner Certificate Successful candidates will receive a Product Owner Certificate issued by Agile Enterprise Coach, adding a tangible credential to your professional achievements.

Assessment Structure and Content

The Product Owner Certification Assessment consists of multiple-choice questions that span a wide array of topics, including but not limited to:

  • Scrum Theory and Empiricism

  • Product Owner Responsibilities and Accountabilities

  • Effective Product Backlog Management

  • Maximizing Value and ROI

  • Stakeholder Engagement and Communication

  • Understanding and Applying the Definition of Done


How to Get Certified

  1. Prepare Thoroughly: Study the Official Scrum Guide and familiarize yourself with the role of the Product Owner.

  2. Complete the Assessment: Answer the multiple-choice questions to the best of your ability.

  3. Submit Your Results: Send proof of your completed assessment to receive your Product Owner Certificate from our institution.

  4. Enhance Your Credentials: Display your certification on your CV and professional profiles to showcase your expertise.
